publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4047 Mr Mark Ruskell: Stop Climate Chaos—That the Parliament welcomes the launch of a pledge campaign by the organisation, Stop Climate Chaos, the coalition of environment, development and faith organisations which has been formed to tackle climate change; acknowledges the strength of concern about climate change which exists within many organisations in Scottish civic society; believes that effective international action to reduce the emissions of greenhouse gases across all sectors is urgently required; supports the pledge campaign objective of persuading people to make changes in their lifestyle that will save energy and reduce their emissions of climate change gases; urges all politicians to play their part, and calls on the Scottish Executive to act without delay to ensure that all of its policies are climate-proofed.
